course.subject: IELM
course.name: Transportation Systems
course.description: Introduction to transportation systems; characteristics of transportation models; traffic flow fundamentals; transportation economics; traffic demand forecasting including trip generation, trip distribution, modal split and trip assignment; interface between transportation systems and logistics planning/operations. For IELM and LMGBM students under the four-year degree only.
course.exclusions: CIVL 3610, CIVL 3620

reviews.author: Grant Lee
reviews.title: Transportation System
reviews.comment_content: The content is interesting, with different aspects of transportation system involved. Practical with lots of calculation.
reviews.comment_teaching: The professor is new to the university, but her teaching is adequate for the course. She is very helpful after class.
reviews.comment_grading: The grading is reasonable. If you complete all the tasks (including homework, midterm and final), you could get a not-so-bad grade.
reviews.comment_workload: The workload is on average not heavy, but since there are only four homework throughout the semester, it could take a lot of time reviewing and finishing homework every time. Remember to start early before the time is not enough!

reviews.author: lawrencetik
reviews.title: IE嚟講算好讀
reviews.comment_content:
內容每年差唔多
睇SOURCE夠做
勁嘅可以唔使上堂
自已溫書就夠(就算冇SOURCE 臨考前都會一次過UPLOAD份教師版嘅LECTURE NOTE上網)
reviews.comment_teaching:
LECTURE英文有口音但影響唔大
個人覺得Ｑｌ　Ｊｉｎ教得好好　教得幾清晰易明
至於TUTORIAL方面　去唔去都得(後期WEEK10,11去過一兩堂 淪落到係單對單上堂...)
reviews.comment_workload:
4份ASSIGNMENT(個人覺得偏難 呢個時侯就係SOURCE出動嘅時侯ＡＳＳＩＧＮＭＥＮＴ題目每份都同往年差唔多　改數字遊戲)
1Midterm term(可以帶一張A4 SIZE嘅貓紙)
1FINAL　ＥＸＡＭ(兩張A4 SIZE嘅貓紙)
